page.title: 17EVERYDAY LIFE IN DENHOLME
page.content: From choice or necessity both parents in a family may work, and, as with single parent families children may arrive home from school to play on their own or with friends. {Weekends}are often spent{shopping, {gardening}or{improving the house. A day at the seaside is a treat at weekends. Most families take some holiday away from home. {Doctors' surgeries, baby clinic}and {chiropodist}help to keep the people healthy. A few local{shops}supply their needs though many shop at supermarkets. {Meals}are varied in food and style. The variety of{housing}in the village attracts different decoration styles. Family pets and allotments are important features. Vandalism, largely confined to the park, and a few burglaries are main problems of police
